did.unittitle: Ionia, Eaton and Barry Farmers' Mutual Fire Insurance Company records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: The company was incorporated in 1881. President was Nathan B. Hayes, secretary J. Warren Peake.
archdesc.scopecontent: Applications for insurance policies, containing property surveys with site plans and descriptions of buildings.
